description:
Rigrit Bers Caurau is a former member of Blue Rose and one of the 13 Heroes, from 200 years ago. She is described as an elderly woman, with a cheerful, and mischievous personality. Also, she is stated to be a Necromancer and, like all magic casters, is able to extend her life beyond natural limits.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Rigrit Bers Caurau
